title: Hextech Annie or Soulstealer vayne?
body: I'm very curious if people still want these skins. Also curious to know if there'd be any new ones coming in the future.

replies.body:
Heck yeah I still want those skins (though not enough to spend money on, I'll buy the occasional set of chest but not for the express purpose of getting gemstones/crafted skins, just cause I like the system).

Personally, I'd get Hextech Annie, I think it's an awesome skin with awesome effects and mmm look at that awesome tibbers and I play supp/mid waaaaaaaaaaaaaay beyond how much I play ADC. That said, Annie already has many great skins, Frostfire and Goth are fab, and I'm a big fan of Red Riding as well. 

Vayne has only 2 skins (excluding soulstealer) that I really like, Dragonslayer is the one that almost everyone has so doesn't really feel worth owning it for a champ I don't play much, and while I really like the SKT skin it's still 750 tier. So from that perspective I would consider Soulstealer Vayne as well.

I do like the ward skin, but not enough to worry about spending gems on it while there is other content I'd want more. As much as I like the two crafted skins, I think I'd wait (and will probably have too just because of the gem drop rate) for another one or two crafted skins in hopes there might be one I like better for a champion I play more/doesn't already have a skin I like/own.

I was lucky enough to get a Hextech Annie shard in the first Hextech Chest I ever bought. With the 3 gemstones I'm holding onto I'd like to eventually get the Hextech Ward (because I love me some ward skins)!

I think it's likely we might see something new to trade our gemstones for in the future but who knows when or how big a priority it is at the moment.
